1.title: The Windmill & the Teenaged Nazi: A Knife on the Back

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: In this episode, you will be introduced to one of the detectives and see a number of wartime paintings.

2.title: The Windmill & the Teenaged Nazi: Tough Teens

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: In this episode, you will learn more about the significance of the knife found on the back of the painting.

3.title: The Windmill & the Teenaged Nazi: It's a World War

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: In the "It's a World War" episode, historical objects and images will be used to show the extent of the global conflict during WWII, as well as to provide more information about the painting.

4.title: The Windmill & the Teenaged Nazi: Into the Meat Grinder

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: In the "Into the Meat Grinder" episode, historical objects and images will be used to tell more of the story about the connection between the Algonquin Regiment and the Hitler Jugend.

5.title: The Windmill & the Teenaged Nazi: Marshes from Hell

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: In the "Marshes from Hell" episode, historical objects and images will be used to provide information about the Algonquin Regiment and the grueling Battle of the Scheldt.

6.title: The Windmill & the Teenaged Nazi: Windmills on the Mind

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: In this episode you will find out more about the life of George Cassidy. You will also learn more about the wartime contribution of the Algonquin Regiment.

1.title: The Mannequin & the Diary: Singing Up and Training

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: In this episode you will follow the two detectives as they discover the WWI diary and start their investigation.

2.title: The Mannequin & the Diary: Headed to Europe

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: In this episode, you will learn more about the soldier Byron Cooper Sisler as he made his way to England for more training.

3.title: The Mannequin & the Diary: Far from Home

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: In this episode you will learn about efforts within Canada to support her soldiers overseas.

4.title: The Mannequin & the Diary: Surviving the Trenches

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: In this episode you will explore how ordinary soldiers tried to cope with the hardships and violence of trench.

5.title: The Mannequin & the Diary: Going Home

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: In this episode you will learn how Byron Cooper Sisler's wartime experience ended.

6.title: The Mannequin & the Diary: A Good Life

episode of.title: Small Town Canada at War (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: This final video will tell the story of Byron Cooper Sisler's life after the war.

imdb.plot outline: The Dairy and the Mannequin focuses on discovering the identity of an actual Canadian WWI soldier and the creation of a small exhibit to tell his story. The Windmill and the Teenaged Nazi focuses on discovering the thematic and historical connections between two WWII related artefacts.
imdb.title: Small Town Canada at War
plot: The Dairy and the Mannequin focuses on discovering the identity of an actual Canadian WWI soldier and the creation of a small exhibit to tell his story. The Windmill and the Teenaged Nazi focuses on discovering the thematic and historical connections between two WWII related artefacts.::The Bunker Military Museum

The two story lines involve a series of videos and video-based questions. At the end of each video, students are asked a question based on the content of the video and must select one of four artefacts that represent the best answer. If correct, they can move onto the next segment; if they guess incorrectly they have to try again.::The Bunker Military Museum
